title: Smart Data Models - EnergySource
description: Adapted from CIM data models. A generic equivalent for an energy supplier on a transmission or distribution voltage level.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be EnergySource

EnergySchedulingType.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Energy Source of a particular Energy Scheduling Type Default: None

WindTurbineType3or4Dynamics.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Wind generator Type 3 or 4 dynamics model associated with this energy source. Default: None

activePower.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. High voltage source active injection. Load sign convention is used, i.e. positive sign means flow out from a node. Starting value for steady state solutions. Default: 0.0

nominalVoltage.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Phase-to-phase nominal voltage. Default: 0.0

r.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Positive sequence Thevenin resistance. Default: 0.0

r0.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Zero sequence Thevenin resistance. Default: 0.0

reactivePower.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. High voltage source reactive injection. Load sign convention is used, i.e. positive sign means flow out from a node. Starting value for steady state solutions. Default: 0.0

rn.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Negative sequence Thevenin resistance. Default: 0.0

voltageAngle.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Phase angle of a-phase open circuit. Default: 0.0

voltageMagnitude.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Phase-to-phase open circuit voltage magnitude. Default: 0.0

x.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Positive sequence Thevenin reactance. Default: 0.0

x0.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Zero sequence Thevenin reactance. Default: 0.0

xn.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Negative sequence Thevenin reactance. Default: 0.0
